title: What about us
brief_description: The film shows a Swedish school class in which the children are all between nine and ten years old. The children give us their view on changes taking place in our environment.
description: The film shows a Swedish school class in which the children are all between nine and ten years old. The children give us their view on changes taking place in our environment.
